prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Sussex County (Va.) Land Records, 1754-1921, Local government records collection, Sussex County Court Records. The Library of Virginia, Richmond, Va. 23219.

acqinfo.head: Acquisition Information
acqinfo.p: These items came to the Library of Virginia in a shipment of court papers from Sussex County. Portions of the collection were transferred under the following accession numbers: 20479, 20480, 20481, 20482, and 24891.

bioghist.head: Historical Information
bioghist.p: Sussex County was named for the English county, and was formed from Surry County by a statute adopted in 1753. The county court first met on 30 May 1754. The county seat is Sussex.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content
scopecontent.p: Sussex County (Va.) Land Records, 1754-1921, consist of Deed Books, Deed Registers, Deeds, General Deed Index, Land Books, Land Titles and Deeds Book, Oversized Unrecorded Deeds, Processioning Districts Drawn, Maps, Plats, Photographs, and Surveyor Field Notes.
